content.json: This dashboard shows an overall view of all alerts in Microsoft Sentinel.

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: ProductName
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| order by Count desc, ProductName asc
| project Value = ProductName, Label = strcat(ProductName, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Security Alerts by Severity

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All";
data
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ProductName)
 on ProductName
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend ProductNames = ProductName
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend ProductName = 'All', ProductNames = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Security Alerts by Product

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| summarize count() by AlertSeverity, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Security Alerts Over Time by Severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| summarize count() by ProductName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Security Alerts Over Time by Product

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| extend Entity_Name = columnifexists("Entity_Name", "")
| extend Entity_ResourceId = columnifexists("Entity_ResourceId", "")
| extend Entity_Directory = columnifexists("Entity_Directory", "")
| extend Entity_Value = columnifexists("Entity_Value", "")
| extend Entity_HostName = columnifexists("Entity_HostName", "")
| extend Entity_Address = columnifexists("Entity_Address", "")
| extend Entity_ProcessId = columnifexists("Entity_ProcessId", "")
| extend Entity_Url = columnifexists("Entity_Url", "")
| extend Target = iif(Entity_Type == "account", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "azure-resource", Entity_ResourceId, iif(Entity_Type == "cloud-application", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "dns", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "file", strcat(Entity_Directory, "\\", Entity_Name), iif(Entity_Type == "filehash", Entity_Value, iif(Entity_Type == "host", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "ip" , Entity_Address, iif(Entity_Type == "malware", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "network-connection", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "process", Entity_ProcessId, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-key", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-value", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "security-group", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "url", Entity_Url, "NoTarget")))))))))))))))
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "host", "ip", "url", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group")
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Target, Entity_Type
| project-away TimeGenerated
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Top Entities in Security Alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName})
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| where ProductName == '{ProductNamePicker}' or '{ProductNamePicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "alerts", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "host", "host-logon-session", "ip", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group", "SrvSvcSessionEntry", "url")
| summarize count() by Entity_Type
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count of Entities in Security Alerts by Type

parameters.name: Workspaces

where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, name
| order by name desc

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, SignatureID, Message
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: IDPS Actions Count, filterable by Action
content.noDataMessage: This feature is in Azure Firewall Premium; For more information go to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/firewall/premium-features

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, SignatureID, Message
| where '{IDSIPSAction}' == Action or '{IDSIPSAction}' == "*"
| summarize count() by Protocol
content.title: IDPS Protocol Count, filterable by Protocol
content.noDataMessage: This feature is in Azure Firewall Premium; For more information go to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/firewall/premium-features

AzureDiagnostics

| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
//| project-away Category, ResourceId, msg_s, SubscriptionId, ResourceProvider, ResourceType, OperationName, Type
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, SignatureID, Message

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, SignatureID, Message

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, SignatureID, Message, Resource
| where '{IDSIPSAction}' == Action or '{IDSIPSAction}' == "*"
| where '{IDSIPSProtocol}' == Protocol or '{IDSIPSProtocol}' == "*"
| where '{IDSIPSSignatureID}' == SignatureID or '{IDSIPSSignatureID}' == "*"
| where '{IDSIPSSourceIP}' == SourceIP or '{IDSIPSSourceIP}' == "*"
| where '{IDSIPSDestIP}' == DestIP or '{IDSIPSDestIP}' == "*"
| summarize count() by Resource, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Azure Firewall IDPS count over time
content.noDataMessage: This feature is in Azure Firewall Premium; For more information go to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/firewall/premium-features

content.query:
let materializedData =
materialize(
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| project ResourceId,ResourceGroup,SubscriptionId, msg_s, Resource, TimeGenerated);
union
(
materializedData
| where msg_s has "Web Category:" and msg_s has ". Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Url:" Url ". Action: " Action ". Rule Collection:" RuleCollection ". Rule:" Rule ". Web Category:" WebCategory
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and msg_s has ". Url" and msg_s has ". No rule matched"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Url:" Url ". Action: " Action ". No rule matched" *
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and msg_s !has ". Url" and msg_s has ". No rule matched"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". No rule matched" *
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s has "Web Category:" and msg_s !has ". Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". Rule Collection:" RuleCollection ". Rule:" Rule ". Web Category:" WebCategory
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and  msg_s !has ". Url" and msg_s !has "Rule Collection" and msg_s !has " Reason: "
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". " RuleCollection ". " Rule
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and  msg_s !has ". Url" and msg_s !has "Rule Collection" and msg_s !has "TLS extension was missing"
| where msg_s has " Reason:"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort ". Action: " Action ". Reason: " Rule "."
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and  msg_s !has ". Url" and msg_s !has  "TLS extension was missing" and msg_s !has "No rule matched"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection ". Rule: " Rule
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Web Category:" and  msg_s !has ". Url" and msg_s !has "Rule Collection" and msg_s !has " Reason: "
| where msg_s has "Rule Collection Group"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". Policy:" Policy ". Rule Collection Group:" RuleCollectionGroup ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection ". Rule: " Rule
)
| where SourceIP <> ""
| where FQDN == "{FullName:label}" or '{FullName}' == "*"
| summarize count() by SourceIP, SubscriptionId
| sort by count_
content.title: SourceIP Address, filterable: Query Time({$queryTime})

content.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networkinterfaces'
| where properties contains "{InvestigateIP}"
| extend NSG = properties['networkSecurityGroup']['id']
| parse NSG with "/subscriptions/" NetworkSecurityGroup_Sub "/resourceGroups/" NetworkSecurityGroup_rg "/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/" NetworkSecurityGroup_Name
| project id, PrivateIPAddress = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['privateIPAddress']),  PublicIPAddress = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['publicIPAddress']['id']), VirtualMachine = tostring(properties['virtualMachine']['id']), subnet = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['subnet']['id']), NetworkSecurityGroup = NetworkSecurityGroup_Name, properties, subscriptionId, tenantId
content.title: SourceIPAddress Resource Lookup: Query Time({$queryTime}) : Total Rows({$rowCount})

content.query:
let materializedData =
materialize(
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where msg_s contains "{InvestigateIPWC:label}" or '{InvestigateIPWC}' == "*"
| where msg_s <> " request from  to . Action: . ThreatIntel: "
| project msg_s, Resource, TimeGenerated,ResourceId , ResourceGroup , SubscriptionId);
union
(
materializedData
| where msg_s has "Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Url: " Url ". Action: " Action ". ThreatIntel: " ThreatIntelMsg
),
(
materializedData
| where msg_s !has "Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". ThreatIntel: " ThreatIntelMsg
)
| summarize by TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, FQDN, DestinationPort, Url, Action, ThreatIntelMsg
content.title: Azure Firewall Threat Intel: Query Time({$queryTime}) : Total Rows({$rowCount})
content.noDataMessage: There is no Azure Firewall Threat Intel for your filtered results

content.query:
//reference list posted here : https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/data-explorer/kusto/query/ipv4-lookup-plugin
let geoData = externaldata
(network:string,geoname_id:string,continent_code:string,continent_name:string,
country_iso_code:string,country_name:string,is_anonymous_proxy:string,is_satellite_provider:string)
[@"{GeoLocation}"] with (ignoreFirstRecord=true, format="csv");
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where msg_s contains "{InvestigateIPWC:label}" or '{InvestigateIPWC}' == "*"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " DestIP ":" DestPort ". Action: " Action ". Signature: " SignatureID ". IDS:" Message ". Priority:" Priority ". Classification:" Classification
| summarize by TimeGenerated, SignatureID, Message, Priority, Classification, Protocol, SourceIP, SourcePort, DestIP, DestPort, Action, Resource
| evaluate ipv4_lookup (geoData, DestIP,  network, false)
content.title: Azure Firewall Premium with GeoLocation- IDPS: Query Time({$queryTime}) : Total Rows({$rowCount})

parameters.name: DefaultSubscription_Internal
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| take 1
| project subscriptionId

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by AlertSeverity
content.title: Alerts by Severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ProviderName, IsIncident
content.title: Alerts by Provider

parameters.name: ProductSelection
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where isnotempty(ProductName)
| summarize count() by  ProductName
| order by count_ desc

parameters.name: SeveritySelect
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where isnotempty(AlertSeverity)
| summarize by AlertSeverity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName in ( {ProductSelection} )
| where AlertSeverity in ({SeveritySelect})
| extend HostName = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].HostName) 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by AlertSeverity, VendorName, ProductName, SystemAlertId, ResourceId, AlertType, StartTime, EndTime, RemediationSteps, AlertLink
content.title: Alert Details for {TimeRange:label}

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| make-series count() default=0 on StartTime from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by ProductName
content.title: Alert Count by Product Over '{TimeRange:label}'

content.query:
ProtectionStatus
| extend Protection = iff(ThreatStatusRank == 150, "Protected", "Security Event Should Be Addressed")
| extend Resource = Computer
| project TimeGenerated, Resource, TypeofProtection, Protection, ThreatStatus ,ProtectionStatus, SignatureVersion
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Resource
content.title: Endpoint Protection Status

content.query:
ProtectionStatus
| where ProtectionStatusRank != 150
| extend Protection = case( ProtectionStatusRank == 250, "Signatures out of date"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 270, "No real-time protction detected"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 470, "No endpoint protection detected"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 550, "Threat detected"
                            , "No threats detected"
                            )
| summarize count() by DeviceName, Protection
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Most Vulnerable Machines

content.query:
Update
| where UpdateState != 'Installed'
| extend Resource = Computer
| summarize count() by Resource
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Resources with Updates within '{TimeRange:label}'

parameters.name: DefaultSubscription_Internal
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| take 1
| project subscriptionId

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value=strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: DefaultWorkspace_Internal
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
|take 1
|project id

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, selected = iff(id =~ '{DefaultWorkspace_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: WAFType
parameters.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES"
| summarize Count=count() by ResourceType
| extend ResourceTypeImproved = iif(ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS", "Application Gateway", ResourceType)
| extend ResourceTypeImproved = iif(ResourceTypeImproved == "FRONTDOORS", "Azure Front Door", ResourceTypeImproved)
| extend ResourceTypeImproved = iif(ResourceTypeImproved == "PROFILES", "Azure Front Door Premium", ResourceTypeImproved)
| extend ResourceTypeImproved = iif(ResourceTypeImproved == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES", "Azure CDN", ResourceTypeImproved)
| order by Count desc, ResourceTypeImproved asc
| project ResourceTypeImproved
parameters.label: WAF Type

parameters.name: WAF
parameters.label: WAF Items
parameters.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or  (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn"))
| summarize Count=count() by Resource
| order by Count desc, Resource asc
| project Value = Resource, Label = strcat(Resource, " - ", Count)

content.title: WAF actions filter

content.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or  (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs"
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where Action == "Block"
| where requestUri_s <> "/"
| summarize count() by requestUri_s 
| top 40 by count_ desc
content.title: Top 40 Blocked Request URI addresses, filter to single URI address
content.noDataMessage: The current data has no "Blocked" results

content.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or  (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs"
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where '{SelectedAction}' == Action or '{SelectedAction}' == "*" 
| where '{RequestURI}' == requestUri_s or '{RequestURI}' == "*"
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| extend Rule= iif(Rule contains "Mandatory rule. Cannot be disabled.", strcat_array(split(Rule, "Mandatory rule. Cannot be disabled. Inbound ",1),""), Rule) // Removes initial component for mandatory rule 
| extend Rule = iif(Rule contains "Total Inbound Score", strcat_array(array_concat(split(Rule, " - SQLI=", 0), parse_json('[") -"]'), split(Rule,"):",1)),""),Rule) // Removes smaller information if more info is available for anomaly score
| summarize count() by Rule
| top 50 by count_ desc
content.title: Top 50 event triggers, filter by rule name

content.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or  (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs"
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where '{SelectedAction}' == Action or '{SelectedAction}' == "*" 
| where '{RequestURI}' == requestUri_s or '{RequestURI}' == "*"
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| where '{Selected}' == Rule or '{Selected}' == "*"
| summarize count() by Rule, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Messages, by time

content.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string,ruleName_s:string,clientIp_s:string,clientIP_s:string,action_s:string,transactionId_s:string,site_s:string,details_message_sRole:string,details_file_sRole:string,hostname_sRole:string,Role:string,trackingReference_s:string,requestUri_s:string,ruleSetType_s:string,details_message_s:string,details_data_s:string,details_file_s:string,hostname_s:string,instanceId_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "","", "", "", "", "","","","","","","","" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs"
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where '{SelectedAction}' == Action or '{SelectedAction}' == "*" 
| where '{RequestURI}' == requestUri_s or '{RequestURI}' == "*"
| where '{Selected}' == Rule or '{Selected}' == "*" 
| extend Role =  extract("ApplicationGateway([a-zA-Z_a-zA-Z_0-9]*)",1,instanceId_s) 
| extend RequestUri = requestUri_s, RuleSetType = ruleSetType_s, Message_Details = details_message_s, Data_Details = details_data_s, File_Details = details_file_s, Hostname = hostname_s, Site = site_s
| project Rule, TimeGenerated, SourceSystem, Hostname, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, ResourceProvider, Category, Role, Action, Site, Message_Details, File_Details, ClientIP, RequestUri
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Message, full details

content.query:
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or  (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or (OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" and Message contains "attack") or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs"
| where '{RequestURI}' == requestUri_s or '{RequestURI}' == "*"
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where '{SelectedAction}' == Action or '{SelectedAction}' == "*" 
| where '{Selected}' == Rule or '{Selected}' == "*" 
| summarize Amount = count() by Rule
| order by Amount desc
content.title: Attacks events, by messages and filterable by rule name
content.noDataMessage: Filtered messages are not attack events

content.query:
let SelectedMS = dynamic({MessageFilter}); // reference to the above list of messages (Event trigger)
let Child = SelectedMS.Rule; // Used to choose a group of messages - redirects to the message which was grouped
let FakeData = (datatable (Message:string, ruleName_s:string, clientIp_s:string, clientIP_s:string, action_s:string, transactionId_s:string,trackingReference_s:string) [ "", "", "", "", "", "", "" ]);
FakeData | union AzureDiagnostics
| where '{RequestURI}' == requestUri_s or '{RequestURI}' == "*"
| where (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" or ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" or ResourceType == "PROFILES" or ResourceType == "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES") and ("{WAFType:label}" == "All" or (ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "application gateway") or (ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and  "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door") or (ResourceType == "PROFILES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "azure front door premium") or (ResourceType=="CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES" and "{WAFType:label}" contains "cdn")) and ("{WAF:label}" == "All" or Resource in ({WAF}))
| where Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or Category == "FrontDoorWebApplicationFirewallLog" or (OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayFirewall" and Message contains "attack") or Category == "WebApplicationFirewallLogs" 
| extend Action = iif(action_s == "Blocked", Action = "Block", action_s)
| extend Action = iif(Action == "Detected", Action = "Log", Action)
| where '{SelectedAction}' == Action or '{SelectedAction}' == "*" 
| extend Rule = strcat(ruleName_s, Message), ClientIP = strcat(clientIp_s, clientIP_s)
| where Rule == Child or Child == "*"
| where '{Selected}' == Rule or '{Selected}' == "*"
| summarize Amount = count() by Rule, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), ResourceId
| project Amount, Rule, TimeGenerated, ResourceId
| order by Amount desc
content.title: Attack events, by time
content.noDataMessage: Filtered messages are not attack events

parameters.name: DefaultSubscription_Internal
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| take 1
| project subscriptionId

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscription})
| project id

parameters.name: KeyVault
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscription})
| project id=tolower(id)

content.query:
datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKV Workbook"]
| extend keyvault = (strcat("[", "{KeyVault}", "]"))
| extend keyvault = todynamic(replace("'", '"', keyvault))
| mvexpand keyvault
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(keyvault))
| summarize AKVs = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForKV = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KeyVaults"
| project DefenderForKV = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AKVs = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AKVs = sum(AKVs), DefenderForKV = sum(DefenderForKV) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId), ["Kay Vaults"] = AKVs, ['Defender for Key Vault'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0,'yes','no'), ['Onboard Azure Defender'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0, '', 'https://ms.portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/26')
| order by ['Defender for Key Vault'] asc
content.title: Subscriptions covered by Azure Defender for Key Vault

content.query:
datatable (Event:string)
    ["AKV Workbook"]
| extend keyvaults = (strcat("[", "{KeyVault}", "]"))
| extend keyvaults = todynamic(replace("'", '"', keyvaults))
| mvexpand keyvaults
| extend subscriptionId = extract(@"/subscriptions/([^/]+)", 1, tostring(keyvaults))
| summarize AKVs = count() by subscriptionId, DefenderForKV = 0
| union
(
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
| where name == "KeyVaults"
| project DefenderForKV = iif(properties.pricingTier == 'Standard', 1, 0), AKVs = 0, subscriptionId
)
| summarize AKVs = sum(AKVs), DefenderForKV = sum(DefenderForKV) by subscriptionId
| project Subscription = 1, ['Defender for Key Vault'] = iif(DefenderForKV > 0,'Protected by Azure Defender','Not protected by Azure Defender')

content.json: ## Azure Defender for Key Vaults alerts

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc

SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({KeyVault})
| where AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ResourceId
| project Resource = tolower(ResourceId), AlertCount
| order by AlertCount desc

SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{AlertSeverity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{AlertSeverity}")
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where ResourceId in ({KeyVault})
| make-series Count=count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ResourceId
//| summarize Count=count() by ResourceId, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Key vault alerts
content.noDataMessage: No alrets from Azure Defender for Key Vaults

content.query:
let Incidents = SecurityIncident
| project AlertIds, IncidentUrl
|mv-expand AlertId = AlertIds
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertId);
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated between ({TimeRangeFilter:start} .. ({TimeRangeFilter:end} + {TimeRange:grain}))
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where ResourceId in ({KeyVault})
| where AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, AlertSeverity, DisplayName, AlertLink, AlertId=tostring(SystemAlertId)
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| join kind=leftouter Incidents on AlertId
| project-away AlertIds, AlertId1
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, AlertSeverity, DisplayName, ['Azure Defender Alert'] = AlertLink, Incident = IncidentUrl, AlertId
content.title: Key vault alerts

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "KV_"
| where SystemAlertId == '{SelectedAlertId}';
let nodes = data
| project Id = SystemAlertId, Name = DisplayName, Size = 1, Kind = 'alert'
| union (
data 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project Id = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-',$id), Name = strcat(ResourceId,Address,AadUserId), Size = 1, Kind = Type
);
let links = data
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project SourceId = SystemAlertId, TargetId = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-', $id), Size = 1, Kind = Type;
nodes | union (links)
content.title: Alert and entity graph (chose an alert from the list above)

parameters.name: Caller
parameters.query:
AzureActivity
| summarize by Caller

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.query:
AzureActivity
| summarize by ResourceGroup

content.query:
let data = AzureActivity
| where "{Caller:lable}" == "All" or "{Caller:lable}" == "All" or Caller in ({Caller})
| where "{ResourceGroup:lable}" == "All" or "{ResourceGroup:lable}" == "All" or ResourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup});
data
| summarize Count = count() by ResourceGroup
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(ResourceGroup:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on ResourceGroup
| project ResourceGroup = iff(ResourceGroup == '', ResourceGroup1, ResourceGroup), Count = iff(ResourceGroup == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ResourceGroup)
 on ResourceGroup
| project-away ResourceGroup1, TimeGenerated
| extend ResourceGroups = ResourceGroup
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend ResourceGroup = 'All', ResourceGroups = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 active resource groups

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where "{Caller:lable}" == "All" or Caller in ({Caller})
| where "{ResourceGroup:lable}" == "All" or ResourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize deletions = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "delete"), creations = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "write"), updates = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "write"), Activities = count(OperationNameValue) by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
content.title: Activities over time

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where "{Caller:lable}" == "All" or Caller in ({Caller})
| where "{ResourceGroup:lable}" == "All" or ResourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize deletions = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "Delete"), creations = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "write"), updates = countif(OperationNameValue hassuffix "write"), Activities = count() by Caller
content.title: Caller activities

content.query:
AzureActivity 
| where "{Caller:lable}" == "All" or Caller in ({Caller})
| where "{ResourceGroup:lable}" == "All" or ResourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize Informational = countif(Level == "Informational"), Warning = countif(Level == "Warning"), Error = countif(Level == "Error") by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

parameters.name: Activity
parameters.query:
SecurityEvent
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| order by Count desc, Activity asc
| project Value = Activity, Label = strcat(Activity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Activity:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on Activity
| project Activity = iff(Activity == '', Activity1, Activity), Count = iff(Activity == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Activity)
 on Activity
| project-away Activity1, TimeGenerated
| extend Activitys = Activity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Activity = 'All', Activitys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 activities - click to filter by activity

content.query:
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All" and AccountType == 'User'
| extend Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account));
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Name
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Name
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Name
| order by TotalCount desc, Name asc
| project Name, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Activity , Name
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Name, Activity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Name, Activity
| order by TotalCount desc, Name asc
| project Name, Activity, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Name
| project Id, Name = Activity, Type = 'Activity', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Name, Type = 'Computer', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Activity Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activities

content.query:
//let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All" and AccountType == 'Machine'
| extend user = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where dynamic({Userinfo}).Type == '*' or (dynamic({Userinfo}).Type == 'Computer' and user == dynamic({Userinfo}).Name);
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Computer
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Computer
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Computer
| order by TotalCount desc, Computer asc
| project Computer, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Activity , Computer
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Computer, Activity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Computer, Activity
| order by TotalCount desc, Computer asc
| project Computer, Activity, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Computer
| project Id, Name = Activity, Type = 'Activity', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Computer, Type = 'Computer', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Activity Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Machine activities

content.query:
let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let Machines = dynamic({MachineInfo});
SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All"
| extend Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where (Users.Type == '*' or (Users.Type == 'Computer' and Name == Users.Name)) and (Machines.Type == '*' or (Machines.Type == 'Computer' and Computer == Machines.Name))
| extend Status = iif(Activity contains "success"," Success" , iif(Activity contains "faile", "Faile", "none"))
| summarize Count = count() by Name, Computer,AccountType, Activity, IpAddress , Process, CallerProcessId, CallerProcessName, CommandLine, FilePath, IpPort,GroupMembership, Status, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Detalis="more details"
| project  Name, Computer,AccountType, Activity, IpAddress, CallerProcessId, CallerProcessName, CommandLine, FilePath, IpPort, Process, GroupMembership, Status, TimeGenerated, Count, Detalis
| order by Count
content.title: Full details

content.query:
let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let Info = dynamic({Info});
let Machines = dynamic({MachineInfo});
SecurityEvent
| where Info == "*" or Process == Info.Process
| where Process != "" and Process != "-"
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All"
| extend Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where (Users.Type == '*' or (Users.Type == 'Computer' and Name == Users.Name)) and (Machines.Type == '*' or (Machines.Type == 'Computer' and Computer == Machines.Name))
| summarize Count = count() by Process, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Processes

content.query:
let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let Info = dynamic({Info});
let Machines = dynamic({MachineInfo});
SecurityEvent
| where Process != "" and Process != "-"
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All"
| where Info == "*" or Process == Info.Process
| extend user = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where (Users.Type == '*' or (Users.Type == 'Computer' and user == Users.Name)) and (Machines.Type == '*' or (Machines.Type == 'Computer' and Computer == Machines.Name))
| summarize Count = count() by Process, Activity, user, Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated, Count
content.title: Processes details

content.query:
let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let Info = dynamic({Info});
let Machines = dynamic({MachineInfo});
SecurityEvent
| where LogonTypeName != ""
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All"
| where Info == "*" or Activity == Info.Activity
| extend user = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where (Users.Type == '*' or (Users.Type == 'Computer' and user == Users.Name)) and (Machines.Type == '*' or (Machines.Type == 'Computer' and Computer == Machines.Name))
| summarize Count = count() by LogonTypeName = strcat( "Logon type: ", LogonTypeName), Activity, user
| order by Count
content.title: Logon activity types

parameters.name: Computer
parameters.query:
Syslog
| summarize syslogEventsCount = count() by Computer
| sort by syslogEventsCount desc
| project Computer

content.query:
Syslog
| summarize count() by SeverityLevel
| extend severityNumber = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 0, iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 1, iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 2, iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 3, iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 4, iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 5, iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 6, iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 7, 8))))))))
| sort by severityNumber asc
| extend Severity = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 'Emergency', iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 'Alert', iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 'Critical', iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 'Error', iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 'Warning', iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 'Notice', iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 'Informational', iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 'Debug', 'Unknown'))))))))
| project-away severityNumber
| where "*" in ({Severity}) or Severity in ({Severity})

Syslog
| where "{Computer:lable}" == "All" or Computer in ({Computer})
| extend Severity = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 'Emergency', iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 'Alert', iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 'Critical', iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 'Error', iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 'Warning', iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 'Notice', iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 'Informational', iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 'Debug', 'Unknown'))))))))
| where "*" in ({Severity}) or Severity in ({Severity})
| where SeverityLevel in ("emerg")
| summarize count() by Computer, TimeGenerated
content.title: "Emergency" level events, by computer
content.noDataMessage: No emergency events within the defined scope

content.query:
Syslog
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend Severity = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 'Emergency', iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 'Alert', iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 'Critical', iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 'Error', iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 'Warning', iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 'Notice', iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 'Informational', iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 'Debug', 'Unknown'))))))))
| extend SeverityNumber = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 0, iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 1, iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 2, iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 3, iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 4, iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 5, iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 6, iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 7, 8))))))))
| where Severity in ({Severity})
|extend Computer = iif(isempty(_ResourceId), Computer, _ResourceId)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, SeverityLevel, SeverityNumber, Facility, HostIP, ProcessNameAndID = strcat(ProcessName, ' (', iff(isempty(ProcessID), "-", tostring(ProcessID)), ')')
content.title: Events
content.noDataMessage: No events

content.query:
Syslog
| where "{Computer:lable}" == "All" or Computer in ({Computer})
| extend Severity = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 'Emergency', iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 'Alert', iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 'Critical', iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 'Error', iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 'Warning', iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 'Notice', iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 'Informational', iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 'Debug', 'Unknown'))))))))
| where "*" in ({Severity}) or Severity in ({Severity})
| summarize count() by SyslogMessage
content.title: Syslog messages of events
content.noDataMessage: No messages

content.query:
Syslog
| where "{Computer:lable}" == "All" or Computer in ({Computer})
| extend Severity = iif(SeverityLevel == 'emerg' or SeverityLevel == 'panic', 'Emergency', iif(SeverityLevel == 'alert', 'Alert', iif(SeverityLevel == 'crit', 'Critical', iif(SeverityLevel == 'err' or SeverityLevel == 'error', 'Error', iif(SeverityLevel == 'warning' or SeverityLevel == 'warn', 'Warning', iif(SeverityLevel == 'notice', 'Notice', iif(SeverityLevel == 'info', 'Informational', iif(SeverityLevel == 'debug', 'Debug', 'Unknown'))))))))
| where "*" in ({Severity}) or Severity in ({Severity})
| summarize count() by Facility, ProcessName
| project Process = strcat(ProcessName, ' (', Facility, ')'), Count = count_
content.title: Process names of events
